content.raw:
The only thing missing I think it is the example. I feel bad copying the test file in the example folder… What if we add the altimeter, the magnetometer and the imu in a single sdf with a box \(or one for each sensor\) moving? That with instructions to read the different sensor output.

I feel that could explain how to use each sensor and build a good documentation.
content.html:
The only thing missing I think it is the example. I feel bad copying the test file in the example folder… What if we add the altimeter, the magnetometer and the imu in a single sdf with a box (or one for each sensor) moving? That with instructions to read the different sensor output.

I feel that could explain how to use each sensor and build a good documentation.
